testCases.query: I need to configure Vite to build for three targets: browser client, Node.js SSR server, and Cloudflare edge workers. How do I set up multi-environment builds?
expectedBehavior: Claude uses the Vite 7 Environment API with the environments config key
Configures separate client, ssr, and edge environment blocks
Sets appropriate build targets (e.g., node20 for SSR, edge/worker conditions for edge)
Uses separate outDir for each environment (dist/client, dist/server, dist/edge)
Mentions that each environment has its own module graph

testCases.query: Our Vite 7 build takes 46 seconds and we're considering Vite 8 with Rolldown. Show me how to migrate manualChunks to the new advancedChunks API.
expectedBehavior: Claude explains the migration from manualChunks to advancedChunks with declarative groups
Provides advancedChunks config with priority, minSize, maxSize, and minShareCount fields
Mentions the rolldown-vite gradual migration path as an option
References performance benchmarks (7.7x build speed improvement)

testCases.query: Write a React component that displays a data table with sorting and filtering
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the vite-advanced skill
Implements a standard React data table component
Uses UI component patterns without build configuration concerns
